1493130.name: RPG Maker MZ - Cyber City: Exterior Tiles
1493130.description:
From the creator of the Cursed Kingdoms Dungeon Tile pack comes a brand-new pack titled Cyber City: Exterior Tiles. This new cyberpunk themed content gives creators the right tools to start building a science fiction atmosphere in their latest RPG creation.

The new Cyber City: Exterior Tiles pack includes city exterior assets such as flooring, vending machines, signs, lighting, and doorways. It also features four different character sprites such as a cyborg man and woman and a robot. These assets will help define your technologically advanced city, so download today and begin your new cyberpunk styled project in RPG Maker!

Features:

* Autotiles (16 x walls, 24 x floors)
* 2 X Full Tile B & C sheets (260 decorative items: windows, solar panels, vending machines, road markings, generators, posters, neon signs etc.)
* 1 x system window skin (formatted for RPG Maker MV)

Animated sheets:

* 4 x 4-dir NPC sprites (8 color variations each)
* 3 x light sources (4 color variations each)
* 5 x regular doors
* 2 x big doors
* 1 x big laser gate


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1493130.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
